mil6.4.1:8.2: dāsikaputtā bhaṭiputtā → dāsaputtā bhaṭṭiputtā (bj, pts1) | dāsaputtā bhattiputtā (maku), soreyyakā → soraṭṭhakā (bj, pts1) | kosambhakā (maku)
mil6.4.1:26.3: ativirocati → atirocati (bj, maku, pts1), abhibhavitvā → atisayitvā (bj, pts1)
mil6.4.1:28.3: na saṇṭhanti → na saṇṭhahanti (bj, maku) | na saṇthanti (pts1), na upalimpanti → na upalippanti (bj, pts1)
mil6.4.1:37.1: acchambhito → asambhīto (bj, pts1) | asambhīto va (maku), vinivijjhissāmī’ti → vijjhissāmīti (bj)
mil6.4.1:60.3: uttame damme → uttame dhamme (bj, pts1) | uttamadhammā (maku)
mil6.4.1:62.1: atulaguṇā → atuliyaguṇā (bj, pts1, mr) | atuliyā guṇa (maku)
mil6.4.1:67.1: ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalā → nidānapaṭhanakusalā (bj, pts1) | nidānavatthukusalā (maku), ti → rūpadakkhāti (bj, maku, pts1)
